CustomField.description: The name of the context to turn on/off. Can be both an SObject OR a specified trigger handler class name (i.e. "Content__c" or "AssetValidationHandler").
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The name of the context to turn on/off. Can be both an SObject OR a specified trigger handler class name (i.e. "Content__c" or "AssetValidationHandler").
CustomField.label: Context Name
